Thank you again for taking the time to participate in Borrego Solar’s Customer Satisfaction Survey. Answers to our survey questions are a valuable contribution to our never ending search to find ways to improve our quality of work, and we greatly appreciate you taking the time to help.

Warm regards,
Philip Hall Director of Marketing 510-496-8705
